mapper.select: select * from power where id=#{0} and status!=-1
select id,pname from power where pid=0 and status!=-1
select a.id,a.pid,a.pname,ifnull(b.pname,'æ— ') fname,a.url,a.icon,a.xh,a.status from power a left join (select id,pname from power) b on a.pid=b.id where a.status!=-1 order by a.xh
mapper.delete: update power set status=-1 where id=#{0}
mapper.update: update power set xh=xh+1 xh=xh-1 where id=#{id}
